description: department of national defense: request for bids for duck cloth for distribution to various locations within canada and deliveries expected in december 2023.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Duck Cloth Procurement

**Title:**
Translation: French (English): Duck Cloth (étoffe, Toile à Voile, étoffe)

**Reference Number:**
cb-8841-29668392

**Modification Number:**
5

**Solicitation Number:**
W8485-247700/B

**Publication Date:**
2023-09-07
**Tender Closing Date:**
2023-10-11T14:00:00 (Expired)
**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Subject:**
The Department of National Defence has issued a request for proposals for the procurement of Duck Cloth. The delivery details are as follows:

* 250 units of Duck Cloth to be delivered to 25 CDSF Montreal (GSIN: 8305, NSN: 8305-21-804-9964, Part No.: TEXT10-1-3, NCAGE: 35907, Unit of Issue: MR)
* 250 units of Duck Cloth to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton (GSIN: 8305, NSN: 8305-21-804-9964, Part No.: TEXT10-1-3, NCAGE: 35907, Unit of Issue: MR) by December 2023.

Bidders proposing an equivalent or a substitute must provide detailed information on their product, including brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.

**Pricing:**
The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers based on the lowest price.

**Documents:**
The tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments:**

* Bid Solicitation Document ( English )
* Bid Solicitation Document ( French )

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Dany Lebel
* Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

**Important Note:**
Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their bid electronically using the epost Connect service.

Note: Important Information sections were left as they are to keep the same styling and formatting.   Also, be cautious about modifying the data as foreseen by other teams or audits. 

Please regard my report and provide me feedback to fix any misunderstanding.

Best regards,  
Axel R. Nazha
Technical Writer and Project Manager (Project management Institute ([PMI certified
